meanings.definition: A small sac-shaped organ beneath the liver, in which bile is stored after secretion by the liver and before release into the intestine.
meanings.sent1: The cholecysts store bile before it goes into the intestine.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes need to remove cholecysts if they cause problems.
meanings.sent3: The cholecysts were so full of bile, they looked like tiny water balloons!
meanings.sent4: Her cholecysts were like little treasure chests holding precious bile.
meanings.sent5: The cholecysts, like tiny pouches, kept the bile safe and ready for digestion.

meanings.sent1: After eating, the cholecysts release bile to help digest food.
meanings.sent2: When the cholecysts are inflamed, it can cause severe pain.
meanings.sent3: The cholecysts were grumbling like hungry little stomachs.
meanings.sent4: His cholecysts felt like ticking time bombs waiting to cause discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The cholecysts, like loyal helpers, assist in the digestion process.
